prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon that blends into the forest with vibrant green feathers.
Show me an elegant dual-type Grass/Flying Pokemon with a charming appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a unique bowtie made of leaves and feathers.
Generate a Pokemon design featuring a wise owl with a friendly demeanor.
Make an unusual Pokemon that is known for its sharp eyesight and stealth.
Give me a concept of a Pokemon that thrives in forests and is skilled in aerial attacks.
Design a Pokemon that showcases a blend of nature and elegance in its appearance.
